comment: Very helpful! Always gives clear expectations! There are a lot of writing assignments for a math course, but they do not take much time.
She was the best teacher I have ever had!!! She teaches so much that will really be used in the field.

Take her! One of the best at KSU, very organized & clear in what she expects. You need to go to class to get the most, explains everything and is always available to help. Perfect early childhood prof!
i've never liked math but she makes it so much easier to understand because she explains it so well. she won't move on until everyone understands. i wish she was teaching more classes.

Very knowledgeable, very nice, and helpful professor. I would highly recommend her. She gave a lot extra credit, she listens to students. Very organized person, I like that. One of the best teachers I've had.
This is a hard class but she really knows what she is talking about and you will learn alot. Only negative part is the number of writing assignments she gives.

Very helpful and clear. turn everything on time!!! don't be afraid to ask questions and go to office hours, she's very patient and will take as much time as needed to make concepts clear. This is not an easy class, however if you have to take it this is the prof for you.
